# PTStorms

> Real-time storm tracking web application for Portugal

PTStorms displays interactive maps with precipitation radar overlays and meteorological warnings from official Portuguese sources.

## Features
- Live precipitation radar from RainViewer API
- IPMA (Portuguese Met Office) weather warnings
- Animated radar playback (past 2 hours + forecast)
- Dark theme optimized for weather viewing

## Data Sources
- Radar: api.rainviewer.com (5-minute updates)
- Warnings: api.ipma.pt (10-minute updates)

## Technical Stack
- Vanilla JavaScript (no framework)
- Leaflet.js for mapping
- Static site hosted on GitHub Pages
